document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Moon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">upon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">fluent </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">Route </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Defiant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Road </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">Star's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Etruscan </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5c94ff">Argument </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#6cffa8">Substantiate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">Aims </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">impel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">these </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">Astral </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Ones </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ones </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b46090">allowed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">makes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">forgot </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">Dawn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e048ff">forgets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The moon upon her fluent route
